DOC.brief_summary: Objective study determine influence dietary supplementation coenzyme Q10 ( CoQ10 ) skin condition . 33 healthy female subject randomly assign placebo group , low-dose ( LD ) group receive 50 mg CoQ10/day high-dose group ( HD ) receive 150 mg CoQ10/day ( 11 subject per group ) . A water-soluble form CoQ10 improve bioavailability ( Quvital syrup Q10vital® , Valens Int . d.o.o. , Slovenia ) use . Various skin parameter evaluate supplementation ( baseline ) , 6 12 week supplementation . To evaluate photoprotective potential CoQ10 minimal erythema dose ( MED ) determine ( baseline ) 12 week supplementation .
DOC.brief_title: Assessment Impact Coenzyme Q10 Supplementation Skin
DOC.detailed_description: Objective study determine influence dietary supplementation CoQ10 form water-soluble Q10vital® skin condition . 33 healthy female subject randomly assign placebo group , low-dose ( LD ) group receive 50 mg CoQ10/day high-dose group ( HD ) receive 150 mg CoQ10/day ( 11 subject per group ) . A water-soluble form CoQ10 improve bioavailability ( Quvital syrup Q10vital® , Valens Int . d.o.o. , Slovenia ) use . The placebo CoQ10 administer form syrup ; subject consume 5 mL syrup daily 12 week . The photoprotective potential CoQ10 evaluate determination minimal erythema dose ( MED ) ( baseline ) 12 week supplementation . Other skin parameter evaluate supplementation ( baseline ) , 6 12 week supplementation . Comparison do mean individual ratio . The difference before-after condition analyze statistical test analysis variance . In case failure find homogeneity variance nonparametric ANOVA , Willcoxon test , use . The result express mean ± standard error group significance level 0.05 statistical test .
DOC.criteria: Signs skin age ( mimic wrinkles/ poor skin tone/ visual dryness ) , Photoaged skin face , Expression mimic wrinkle , Phototype II III . Allergy ingredient test product High blood cholesterol use cholesterollowering medicine , Diagnosed diabetes Thyroid disease Inflammatory skin disease , Regular use dietary supplement 6 month less start study , Invasive rejuvenation treatment ( botox injection , hyaluronic acid filler , needle roller , needle mesotherapy , etc . ) 6 month less prior start study , Noninvasive rejuvenation treatment ( radiofrequency , electrotherapy , ultrasound therapy , noneedle mesotherapy , etc . ) 6 month less prior start study , The use cosmetic product contain coenzyme Q10 6 month less prior start study , Gluteal hyperpigmentation , Expected sunbathing ( also solariums ) within study period .
